title: Advanced Fin Reporting
description: Financial reporting and accounting for: mergers and acquisitions; consolidated financial statements; international transactions and hedges of exchange-rate fluctuations; partnerships; and governmental and not-for-profit organizations.  Credit not allowed for both MGT 4043 and MGT 6043.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MGT 4026 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
